attributes.action: immediately reintroduce democracy into the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown travels the world posturing in favour of self-determination of the people while pro-actively denying the people of the UK ANY opportunity to have a say in how things should be in this country.  There is so very much wrong in what he and his government are doing at home while embarrassing the population with the statements they make in other countries.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
